title: Election 2012 exit polls : percentage of votes by ethnicity
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
Out of all 2 groups, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes for Race Black and Mitt Romney had the lowest Percentage of votes for Race Black.
There is a gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Mitt Romney in Race White and Black.
Averaging all 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney, the Race Asian is the maximum Percentage of votes and White is the minimum Percentage of votes.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Black had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Barack Obama. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Race Black for Mitt Romney.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
Out of all 2 groups, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes for Race Black and Mitt Romney had the lowest Percentage of votes for Race Black.
There is a gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Mitt Romney in Race White and Black.
Averaging all 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney, the Race Asian is the maximum Percentage of votes and White is the minimum Percentage of votes.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
For Race Black, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes 93.0 among the 2 groups and in Black, Mitt Romney had the lowest Percentage of votes 6.0.
Among all the Races, Mitt Romney had the highest Percentage of votes in Race White and lowest Percentage of votes in Race Black.
There is a gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Mitt Romney in Race White and Black.
Among the groups, Barack Obama had the biggest difference in Percentage of votes. Where the maximum Percentage of votes was 2.38 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes.
Averaging all 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney, the Race Asian is the maximum Percentage of votes and White is the minimum Percentage of votes.
